message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $112.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $107?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. I'm not going any lower than that.
I'm willing to meet you at $108.50. I think this is a fair price considering the original price of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
